Description.Text: Novotel London Blackfriars is a contemporary 4-star hotel offering modern accommodation in the heart of London. Highlights include onsite dining, an indoor swimming pool, a gym and an excellent location close to the Tate Modern. The South Bank is a prestigious riverside development home to excellent restaurants, museums and entertainment venues. Nearby places of interest include the London Eye, Tate Modern, National Theatre and Shakespeare's Globe. Southwark tube station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular London destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise building featuring sleek glass panelling. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a gym, sauna and video games area. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Elements offers international cuisine in a stylish setting, whilst guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Superior rooms are decorated in a bright, modern style. Amenities include air-conditioning, a work desk, mini-bar, safe and 32-inch flat-screen satellite/cable TV with on-demand content. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower and are separated by glass panelling which transforms from a clear to opaque finish. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
